formalParameter.description: A depot path representing a branch.

The specific changelist to get. Options:
1) A specific changelist number 2) The string "have" in which case the workspace 'template" will be used 3) blank in which case the most recent changelist will be used
The name of a saved SCM configuration
The root of the destination directory for files
Enable parallel sync option, requires server version 2014.1 or later.
If checked will perform a forced sync - 'p4 sync -f'
If checked will perform an CloudBees CD Smart Sync
If checked will perform a basic 'p4 sync'.
If checked will retain the client following a template sync
If checked will delete files in the client root used for Smart Sync that aren't present in the depot. This option only works with Smart Sync.
If checked, "..." won't be added to complete the paths on the View parameter.
The start point for update log. Next changelist will be included in the update log.
The name of an existing template to copy for use as the temporary client
Specifies the stream to be used to create the temporary client.
Generate changelog on checkout step
If non blank, this is used as the name of a file to be written with the text change comments of all changes included in this checkout since the lastSnapshot
Automatic Ticket Login/Logout
Unique text to use in the name of created client spec
Text to add to the end of the client spec name
p4 client option allwrite
p4 client option clobber
p4 client option compress
p4 client option locked
p4 client option modtime
p4 client option rmdir
Clean workspace before syncing?
List of CLs to unshelve after sync
Skip sync and just generate reports
The name of the configuration to be created
The debug level for output

procedure.description: Example of how to use getSCMTag

formalParameter.description: The SCM configuration name

The client or depot to monitor for CI changes. This parameter can take several forms:
1) Give the name of in existing P4 client and it will be used i.e. "myClient" p4 -c myClient changes -t -m 1 //myClient/...
2) Give a single depot name (starting with //) i.e. "//myChanges" p4 changes -t -m 1 //myChanges/...
3) A newline separated list of client "view" lines in the form "depot;files". A temporary client will be created. i.e. "//depot/main;main\n//depot/sdk;sdk" //depot/main/... //tempclient/main/... //depot/sdk/... //tempclient/sdk
If the P4ClientOrDepot is blank, the contents of P4Paths will be used instead and the rules above will be applied.

If P4ClientOrDepot is specified as view lines, this parameter lets you set exclusions
i.e. "//depot/tools/old;tools/old" Creates the following lines in the temporary client spec:
-//depot/tools/old... //tempclient/tools/old/...
Series of commands performed before checking client (i.e. dynamically generating a clientspec). (optional)
Automatic Ticket Login/Logout

procedure.description: Run the agent side of a preflight workflow

formalParameter.description: The SCM configuration to use
The destination for files.
Name of perforce client that will be retained between checkouts runs. Mandatory, and applies only when Incremental Sync option is enabled.
If checked will perform incremental preflight
If checked will perform smart sync preflight
If checked will delete files in the client root used for smart sync that aren't present in the depot. This option only works with smart sync.

procedure.description: If the job's outcome is successful, update a last successful snapshot property to the revision used in the job.

formalParameter.description: The configuration name
